title: Euro 1995 Ferrari F512 M
description: This 1995 Ferrari F512 M is one of 501 examples produced worldwide between 1994 and 1996. Originally delivered in Europe, it was relocated to Japan in 2008 and imported to the US by the selling dealer in 2024. The car is finished in Nero Carbonio Metallizzato and is powered by a 4.9-liter flat-12 mated to a five-speed manual transaxle and a limited-slip differential. A timing belt service was performed in 2022. Inside, the optional carbon-fiber bucket seats are trimmed in Nero upholstery, and additional features include air conditioning, power windows, an Alpine CD stereo, and a gated shifter. The car rides on 18" multi-piece Speedline wheels and fully adjustable Quantum Racing suspension components and also has an aftermarket exhaust system. Now showing 35k kilometers (~22k miles), this F512 M is offered in California with the owner's manual, service records, a tool kit, and a clean Arizona title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a Euro 1995 Ferrari F512 M at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #181,033.
